data.title: Prof. J. W. De Haas Gets Rumford Physics Award
data.meta_description: Professor J. W. de Haas of Leyden, prominent Dutch Jewish physicist, has been awarded the Rumford medal of the Royal Society of London. The award, a prized distinction in the world of physics and chemistry, was given for researches in the properties of bodies at low temperatures.
data.text:
Professor J. W. de Haas of Leyden, prominent Dutch Jewish physicist, has been awarded the Rumford medal of the Royal Society of London.

The award, a prized distinction in the world of physics and chemistry, was given for researches in the properties of bodies at low temperatures.
